content: **the tippy cowl is a standard neck warmer cowl that uses a stitch by color technique aka assigned or intentional color pooling technique the written pattern can be v iewed on my website 1 or the pdf can be purchased here on ravelry or etsy there is also a video tutorial 2 for this pattern ** > **use code get1off at checkout for $1 off a pattern purchase ** **size ** flat top width = 11 /28 cm bottom width = 13 /33 cm length = 10 5 / 26 5 cm **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet special stitch instructions for a puff working in turned rounds **yarn ** #3 dk light worsted weight tippy tree yarns dk in holiday cheer shop now closed 225 total yards *the featured color will be whatever color is in your dk weight yarn skein that has a length of 25-26 /63-66 cm the featured color special stitch is the puff st * **tools ** us size g+/7 4 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors measuring tape **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //www simplyhookedbyjanet com/crochet-cowl-assigned-pooling/ 2 https //youtu be/bm_rn_yfb-4
